channel.title: No idea what I am doing wrong on server creating (Pics)
channel.description:
I've been at this for 3 weeks so far and nothing worked so far. 5 people have gave me suggestions and none of them worked yet. I will give describitions of what I am. I have a desk top computer with linksys, router WRT54G and I've changed my ip twice before. I was trying static ip before and it didn't work out but maybe I messed up portforward back then. I've changed the firewall exception name for my open port for purezscape.no-ip.biz, purezscape, and RSPS then portforward application name to purezscape to RSPS. Nothing worked...My friends tell me to give up but I don't want to. I've actually done alot for the server in my own time and I want to show people what I have done. Here are pics of what I have of portforward,open port, linksys, etc
[img]http://img352.imageshack.us/img352/6228/servpicec1.png[/img]
[img]http://img352.imageshack.us/img352/6066/servprob2dr9.png[/img]
[img]http://img527.imageshack.us/img527/9021/servprob3nd8.png[/img]
[img]http://img352.imageshack.us/img352/9537/servprob4ax3.png[/img]

item.title: No idea what I am doing wrong on server creating (Pics)
item.dc:creator: @webhostbudd webhostbudd
item.description:
@webhostbudd wrote:

I forget what protocol the server uses but it could be udp although I doubt it. Just try it to see if it works. Also, are you sure windows firewall is the only firewall running on your computer?

Also make sure that the server will work for you and that the port on the server is not changed.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
